EmailTemplate.subject: What’s new from Martell?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
Enjoyed Savour?
We’d like to thank everyone who joined us at L'Espace Martell and made the Savour Gourmet Festival a success. We hope you enjoyed Alvin Leung’s master classes and learned more about cognac from Jean-Jacques Mernier.
Save the date September 8-11 as L'Espace Martell returns on the next Savour. <[[http://www.savour.sg/]]>
Pairing with Martell
We are proud to present to you the chefs who were the contenders in Martell's Project: Chef. See how the different flavours and aromas of Martell can pair perfectly with their gastronomic creations.
Watch the video <[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.sg/videos/2041326719424981/]]>
Celebrate Dads on 19th June
Surprise him this Father's Day with a limited offer; the Martell Cohiba Cognac & a Cohiba cigar. The Martell Cohiba is composed exclusively of Grande Champagne eau-de-vie and is the perfect match for cigars.
Place your order here <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGP_MRT_May_NL_Page-Registration.html]]>
